citations.narrative:
In two enclosures housing swinhoe's pheasants, #16 (door) and #21(panel), the chicken wire was damaged creating
sharp points and no longer in good repair. Primary enclosures must be designed and constructed of suitable materials so
that they are structurally sound and must be kept in good repair with no sharp points that could injure the birds.
Correct by 20 August 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
In two enclosures housing swinhoe's pheasants, #16 (door) and #21(panel), the chicken wire was damaged creating 
sharp points and no longer in good repair. Primary enclosures must be designed and constructed of suitable materials so 
that they are structurally sound and must be kept in good repair with no sharp points that could injure the birds. 
Correct by 20 August 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
